title: CRM Implementation for Mid-Market SaaS
description: End-to-end Salesforce Sales Cloud implementation including lead routing, opportunity stages, basic reports, and SSO via Okta.

title: Healthcare Patient Portal Rollout
description: Deploy a secure patient portal with messaging, appointment booking, and HIPAA-aligned access controls; integrate with EHR via FHIR APIs.

title: Data Pipeline for Billing Analytics
description: Ingest billing events from Stripe, transform to a unified schema, warehouse in Snowflake, and build KPI dashboards.

title: SSO + SCIM for Enterprise HR
description: Implement SSO (SAML) and automated user provisioning (SCIM) for an enterprise customer; include just-in-time (JIT) role mapping.

title: Bottom-Up Estimation Template Builder
description: Design and build a bottom-up estimation Excel template and import service, including validation and line-item rules.

title: Document Generation with Docxtemplater
description: Generate SOW and Proposal documents using Docxtemplater with custom tags, conditional content, and image placeholders.

title: Salesforce → Zoma Platform Events
description: Implement Salesforce Platform Events to notify Zoma on opportunity stage changes and attachments updates.

title: Vector Search for Opportunity Similarity
description: Build an embedding-based similarity search across past opportunities, combining titles, descriptions, and tags with metadata filters.

title: Kantata OX Sync
description: Sync opportunities to Kantata OX upon Closed Won; map fields and validate errors. Provide a reconciliation dashboard.

title: Top-Down AI Chat for Estimation
description: Enable a persistent AI chat that helps PMs estimate phases and risks; enforce strict JSON outputs for timelines.

title: Mixpanel Product Analytics Enablement
description: Track key events across Zoma app; set up funnels and retention reports; data governance with event naming conventions.

title: Playwright E2E for AI Features
description: Write Playwright tests to validate AI-assisted timeline generation and guardrails for invalid JSON outputs.
